name:
Step 2: Locate the Astronomicon: +10 Awareness Test, success adds +10 per DoS to Navigation (Warp) Tests, fail is -10 per DoF to same tests.
The Astronomicon acts as a Psychic Lighthouse, Navigator makes +10 Awareness Test to find it, adding +10 to Navigation (Warp) Tests to Navigation (Warp) Tests for voyage per DoS, or -10 per DoF. If failing by 3+ DoF, Can't find Astronomicon and Charting Vessel Course requires -60 Navigation (Warp) Test. Well-made charts, environmental factors such as Warp Storms, and so on may affect test.

system.adept: Navigation(Warp) Test bonus will become relevent in Step 4.

description.value: Adept: Navigation(Warp) Test bonus will become relevent in Step 4.
